message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.  Given its features and benefits, I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm trying to be mindful of my budget. Can you meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I understand your budget considerations, $12,000 is significantly below its true value. Could you do $17,000? This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $17,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,000. Can you consider this price?
